people.name: John Smith
people.title: Software Engineer
people.bio: John Smith is a software engineer with 10 years of experience in the industry. He has worked on a variety of projects ranging from web applications to mobile apps. In his free time, John enjoys playing basketball and hiking.

people.name: Jane Doe
people.title: Data Analyst
people.bio: Jane Doe is a data analyst with 5 years of experience in the field. She has worked with large datasets and has experience in data visualization and analysis. In her free time, Jane enjoys painting and playing guitar.

people.name: Bob Johnson
people.title: Project Manager
people.bio: Bob Johnson is a project manager with 8 years of experience managing software development projects. He is experienced in agile methodologies and has led successful projects in a variety of industries. In his free time, Bob enjoys cooking and gardening.
